Detailed Description

Exposes methods for accessing system processes.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktProcess::DefaultIcon ( [out, retval] IPicture **  icon)
get

Get the default process icon.

Parameters
[in,out]iconPointer to IPicture interface receiving the process icon.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on unknown error.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::DomainName ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the domain where the process was created.

Parameters
[in,out]pValIf non-null, the value.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_OUTOFMEMORY if pVal points to a string with insufficient space
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::FileHeader ( [out, retval] INktStructPEFileHeader **  ppVal)

Gets an interface to access the process image Portable Executable (PE) header.

Parameters
ppValA pointer to receive the PE file header interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.
HRESULT INktProcess::FunctionByAddress ( [in] my_ssize_t  addr,
[in] eNktSearchMode  searchMode,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function where the provided address belongs to.

Parameters
addrThe address to search for.
searchModeThe search mode to use.
[in,out]ppExpFuncPointer to store the matching function, if any. Cannot be NULL..
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktProcess::FunctionByName ( [in] BSTR  name,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function with the provided name.

Parameters
nameThe function name to search for.
[in,out]ppExpFuncPointer to store the matching function, if any. Cannot be NULL..
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppExpFunc is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if name is NULL or empty.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktProcess::Handle ( [in] LONG  desiredAccess,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)

Get this process handle.

Parameters
desiredAccessThe desired access mode. If you specify NULL, the default security descriptor is used. See Process Security and Access Rights.
[in,out]pValA pointer where to store handle. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the process handle cannot be obtained using the selected access mode.
HRESULT INktProcess::Icon ( [out, retval] IPicture **  icon)
get

Get process icon.

Parameters
[in,out]iconPointer to IPicture interface receiving the process icon.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on unknown error.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::Id ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the id of process (PID).

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to store the PID. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::InvalidateCache ( [in] my_ssize_t  hDll)

Invalidates internal module and exports cache.

Returns
S_OK on success.
HRESULT INktProcess::IsActive ( [in, defaultvalue(1000)] LONG  waitTimeMs,
[out, retval] VARIANT_BOOL *  pVal 
)
get

Checks if the process is active.

Parameters
waitTimeMsThe wait time in milliseconds.
[in,out]pValPointer to store the boolean value .Cannot be null.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_INVALIDARG if provided wait time argument is not valid.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::LogonSID ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the sid of the user owning who created the process.

Parameters
[in,out]pValIf non-null, the value.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_OUTOFMEMORY if pVal points to a string with insufficient space
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::Memory ( [out, retval] INktProcessMemory **  ppProcMem)
optional

Get an interface to access the process memory.

Parameters
[in,out]ppProcMemA pointer to store the INktProcessMemory interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppProcMem is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::ModuleByAddress ( [in] my_ssize_t  addr,
[in] eNktSearchMode  searchMode,
[out, retval] INktModule **  ppMod 
)

Find the module where the provided address belongs to.

Parameters
addrThe address to match.
searchModeThe search mode.
[in,out]ppModPointer to store the matching module, if any. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppMod is NULL.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktProcess::ModuleByName ( [in] BSTR  name,
[out, retval] INktModule **  ppMod 
)

Find the module with the provided name.

Parameters
nameString containing the module name to search for.
[in,out]ppModPointer to store the matching module, if any. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_POINTER if ppMod is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if name argument points to a NULL or empty string.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if there is no match.
HRESULT INktProcess::Modules ( [out, retval] INktModulesEnum **  ppModEnum)

Get the modules of the process.

Parameters
[in,out]ppModEnumA pointer to INktModulesEnum* enumerator. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if ppModEnum is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::Name ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the executable file name.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to a BSTR string to store the name. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success
E_OUTOFMEMORY if pVal points to a string with insufficient space
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.

optional

Gets an interface to access the process image optional Portable Executable (PE) header.

Parameters
ppValA pointer to receive the PE optional header interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.

Get the id of parent process.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to store the parent process PID. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.

Get the platform bits of the process.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to store the platform bitness data. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::PriorityBaseClass ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the priority base class of the process.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to store the process thread count. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktProcess::Privilege ( [in] BSTR  privilegeName,
[out, retval] VARIANT_BOOL *  pVal 
)
getoptional
HRESULT INktProcess::Privilege ( [in] BSTR  privilegeName,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  newValue 
)
setoptional

Checks Get and sets process privilege.

Parameters
[in]privilegeNameA string with the privilege to look for. See Privilege constants.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG is privilegeName is empty, NULL, or invalid.
E_FAIL if privilege cannot be set or accessed.
HRESULT INktProcess::Sections ( [out, retval] INktStructPESections **  ppVal)
optional

Gets an interface to access the process image Portable Executable (PE) sections.

Parameters
ppValA pointer to receive the PE sections interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppVal is NULL.
E_FAIL if a general error occurs.
HRESULT INktProcess::Terminate ( [in, defaultvalue(0)] LONG  exitCode)

Terminates the process.

Parameters
exitCodeThe exit code.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_FAIL on general failure.
HRESULT INktProcess::ThreadsCount ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the threads count in the process.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to store the process thread count. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success or E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
